eu.trentorise.smartcampus.osm.android.util

Class OSMGeocoding

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.trentorise.smartcampus.osm.android.util.OSMGeocoding

  • public class OSMGeocoding
extends java.lang.Object
    A class for handling Geocoding and Reverse Geocoding with the osm.android.bonuspack.location.GeocoderNominatim;. Geocoding is the process of transforming a street address or other description of a location into a (latitude, longitude) coordinate. Reverse geocoding is the process of transforming a (latitude, longitude) coordinate into a (partial) address. The amount of detail in a reverse geocoded location description may vary, for example one might contain the full street address of the closest building, while another might contain only a city name and postal code.
    Author:
    Dylan Stenico

      static java.util.List<Address> FromPointToAddress(GeoPoint mPoint, Context mContext)
      Returns a list of Addresses that are known to describe the named location, which may be a place name such as "Dalvik, Iceland", an address such as "1600 Amphitheatre Parkway, Mountain View, CA", an airport code such as "SFO", etc.. .

    • Method Detail

      • FromAddressToPoint

        public static java.util.ArrayList<GeoPoint> FromAddressToPoint(java.lang.String mAddress,
                                               Context mContext)
        Returns an array of Addresses that are known to describe the area immediately surrounding the given latitude and longitude. The returned addresses will be localized for the locale provided to this class's constructor.
        Parameters:
        mAddress - a String describes the location
        mContext - the Application context
        Returns:
        ArrayList of GeoPoint

      • FromPointToAddress

        public static java.util.List<Address> FromPointToAddress(GeoPoint mPoint,
                                         Context mContext)
        Returns a list of Addresses that are known to describe the named location, which may be a place name such as "Dalvik, Iceland", an address such as "1600 Amphitheatre Parkway, Mountain View, CA", an airport code such as "SFO", etc.. .
        Parameters:
        mPoint - a Point describe the position
        mContext - the Application context
        Returns:
        List of Address
